files.patch:
@@ -1494,2 +1494,4 @@
-          // 1. Move from RangeCheck "a" to RangeCheck "b": don't need to pin. If we ever remove b, then we pin all its array accesses at that point.
-          // 2. We move from RangeCheck "a" to regular if "b": need to pin. If we ever remove b, then its array accesses would start to float, since we don't pin at that point.
+          // 1. Move from RangeCheck "a" to RangeCheck "b": don't need to pin. If we ever remove b, then we pin
+          //    all its array accesses at that point.
+          // 2. We move from RangeCheck "a" to regular if "b": need to pin. If we ever remove b, then its array
+          //    accesses would start to float, since we don't pin at that point.
